subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Mississippi State senior linebacker Jamar Chaney had surgery for a broken leg and is out for the season. Coach Sylvester Croom said Chaney had surgery on Sunday to repair a fracture he sustained Saturday in a loss at Louisiana Tech.
snippet: The Mississippi State senior linebacker Jamar Chaney had surgery for a broken leg and is out for the season. Coach Sylvester Croom said Chaney had surgery on Sunday to repair a fracture he sustained Saturday in a loss at Louisiana Tech.
